Pre-Game Insights: The San Diego Padres play the Arizona Diamondbacks with a 1-0 series lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams square off Saturday for the 12th time this season.
The Padres are ahead 6-5 in the season series.
Others: Arizona is 88-72 overall and 43-36 in home games.
The Diamondbacks are third in the NL with 208 total home runs, averaging 1.3 per game.
San Diego has a 92-68 record overall and a 47-32 record in road games.
The Padres have the seventh-best team slugging percentage in the majors at.421.
Eugenio Suarez has 28 doubles, two triples, 29 home runs and 99 RBI for the Diamondbacks.
Ketel Marte is 9-for-31 with two doubles and three home runs over the last 10 games.
Jackson Merrill has 31 doubles, six triples, 24 home runs and 90 RBI for the Padres.
Manny Machado is 12-for-39 with two doubles and three home runs over the past 10 games.
